snippet.title: Super Mario and the Crystal Crescents - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario and the Crystal Crescents is a 1 world mod of New Super Mario Bros. 2 that I've been working on since 2022 and which has finally been released!

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TenV3ZEYkLNwnCE_3cTn3nzVbkhqohAL

Check out the mod's soundtrack: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=OLAK5uy_mMUoGnR3mAAVjhmoTGvBjU2rNoORahS10

The music in both this trailer and the mod was made by @Ri0GenMusic 
Most of the mod's 3D graphics were made by @hus_mighty
The mod's music was imported by @DoctorTricky_
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Hello everyone, Rimea here!
This channel is all about modding modern Mario games such as Super Mario Bros. Wonder and Mario Kart 8 Deluxe.
Apart from showcasing my mods, I also make videos explaining the mod creation process.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► Discord: https://discord.gg/G5jfjUQWgv
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/The_Rimea
► Bluesky: https://rimea.bsky.social
► Email: rimeamodding@gmail.com
